ValidationRule.description: This rule prevents the user from making changes to any field when the status is Closed.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Setup.cgcloud__Validation_Rules_Setting__c.cgcloud__Bypass_Validation__c = FALSE, ISPICKVAL(cgcloud__Status__c, 'Closed'), ISCHANGED(cgcloud__Fund_Template__c) || ISCHANGED(cgcloud__Currency__c) || ISCHANGED(cgcloud__Anchor_Account__c) || ISCHANGED(cgcloud__Anchor_Product__c) || ISCHANGED(cgcloud__Valid_From__c) || ISCHANGED(cgcloud__Valid_Thru__c) || ISCHANGED(cgcloud__Description_Language_1__c) || ISCHANGED(cgcloud__Description_Language_2__c) || ISCHANGED(cgcloud__Description_Language_3__c) || ISCHANGED(cgcloud__Description_Language_4__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This record is closed. Changes are not permitted.
